title: Senior Backend Developer
description: TechInnovate is seeking an experienced Senior Backend Developer to join our growing engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining high-performance, scalable backend services that power our SaaS platform.
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable backend APIs and services
Optimize database queries and data models for performance
Work with DevOps to implement CI/CD pipelines
Mentor junior developers and perform code reviews
Collaborate with frontend teams to ensure seamless integration
requirements: 5+ years of professional software development experience
Strong knowledge of Node.js and Express.js framework
Experience with PostgreSQL and database optimization
Experience with AWS or similar cloud services
nice_to_have: Experience with Redis or other caching solutions
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
